item.title: About
item.author: a.saleem2993@gmail.com (Abdullah Saleem)
item.description: Wrote my first ever computer program in GW-BASIC (contrary to what it may seem, I’m not that old) then found a course book on C so printf it was which eventually turned to cout<<cin and then I found the holly grail of VB.NET and for quite I while it was all Dim this Dim that and the love of drag and drop GUI started taking over me but that english like syntax of VB.
